Hi all,

I'm computing a relevance score of each URI based on the HTML cont=
ent of the URI in a processor and an external IE prorgam. I would like to u=
se this score to set the precendence for the extracted links of the URI.

H=
ow do I add this score to the CrawlURI/ProcessorURI so I can access it in a=
nother Processor?

I have looked into the Key class but didn't really get t=
he concept of it and it seems I only can set on static final values?!?

Hop=
e this makes sense...it's kinda late in the night here...

Thanks much in a=
dvance!

Georgie
